basics.name: Madeline Dexter
basics.label: Data Developer
basics.summary: Madeline is a data developer with experience in database management, ETL development, data warehousing, cloud infrastructure, business analytics, and peer mentorship. She has architected data flow patterns for a range of companies with products like Snowflake, Redshift, RDS, Kubernetes, Terraform, Docker and Jenkins. Madeline works in languages like Python, Java, and various SQL and shell scripting dialects. In addition to tech, Madeline is passionate about music, languages, cooking, beer, and trans rights.

work.name: Vivid Seats
work.description: Online ticket marketplace where fans can buy and sell tickets to sports, concerts, and theater events nationwide
highlights: Wrote and deployed microservices to enable codependent RDS/Snowflake migrations
Deployed and managed infrastructure to support company adoption of microservices
Upgraded and debugged OLTP & OLAP RDS instances with minimal impact to production
Developed a user identity, role, and warehouse management system for Snowflake/Azure
Developed a task execution model for extraction of OLTP data into cached Snowflake views

work.name: KAR Auction Services
work.description: Company that provides sellers and buyers across the global wholesale used-vehicle industry with technology-driven remarketing solutions
highlights: Developed database models and views for ingestion and analysis of inbound data
Wrote a common tools package for Python to perform uniform ETL ingestion of company data
Wrote, deployed, and managed EMR jobs to process big data sets with PySpark
Designed and maintained an S3 data lake to structure inbound vendor data-of-record
Dockerized existing ETL jobs and deployed them to ECS with Terraform

work.name: ReviewLabs
work.description: Company which provided business intelligence services for Amazon merchants
highlights: Created the ReviewLabs business model and develop with two co-founders
Performed legal and accounting work e.g. incorporation, bookkeeping, and contracting
Designed all marketing materials including web assets and promotional videos

work.name: Discover Financial Services
work.description: Financial services company that offers checking and savings accounts, personal loans, home equity loans, student loans and credit cards
highlights: Managed a company-wide intranet reporting site for collections inventory analysis
Facilitated A/B testing on strategic initiatives and reported on the results
Identified and worked with IT teams to resolve data warehousing integrity issues

work.name: Discover Financial Services
work.description: Financial services company that offers checking and savings accounts, personal loans, home equity loans, student loans and credit cards
highlights: Managed a team of analysts who administered a database and intranet reporting site
Collaborated with department leaders to leverage data assets into actionable intelligence
Hired and mentored reporting analysts and performed regular performance evaluations

work.name: Discover Financial Services
work.description: Financial services company that offers checking and savings accounts, personal loans, home equity loans, student loans and credit cards
highlights: Co-administered a department-wide performance reporting and analysis intranet website
Co-developed and maintained a MySQL database as a backend for the reporting website
Developed applications to satisfy compliance requirements and performance initiatives
